name: Dinosaur Rampage - Trex Free
description:
Dinosaur Rampage - Simulator Safari - Hunt or be Hunted

Control your dinosaur through a realistic city 

Roam free throughout the city as you take dinosaur rage to a new level
Smash cars, boxes, even buildings 
Realistic True 3D arcade action simulation.
 Stunning Deep Visuals

You are an angry Tyrannosaurus (T-Rex) dinosaur hellbent on creating as much dinosaur damage as possible. Become the hunter and smash the city to pieces.

In this exciting game there is only one goal smash things dinosaurs!

Be careful as you are also being hunted by giant chickens and other crazy animals.

You are a hunter or prey in this exciting game? Play and you will find out. Love Goat Simulator ? Then you will love this!
